original_text: Then Samson reached toward the two central pillars on which the temple stood. Bracing himself against them, his right hand on the one and his left hand on the other,
korean_text: 삼손이 집을 버틴 두 기둥 가운데 하나는 왼손으로 하나는 오른손으로 껴 의지하고

sentences.original_text: Then Samson reached toward the two central pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 삼손은 두 개의 중앙 기둥을 향해 손을 뻗었다

sentences.original_text: his right hand on the one
and his left hand on the other
